text: Albertus Perk (16 September 188714 May 1919) was a Dutch fencer. He competed in the individual épée event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1919 deaths Category:Dutch male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the Netherlands Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:People from Anna Paulowna
title: Albertus Perk
